price: (135) Indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a terrible day."
arabic: إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: innī akhāfu ʿalaykum ʿadhāba yawmin ʿaẓīmin
